ShoujoKageki:RealTimeEvent.NAME: 观众席是这么近的吗？
DESCRIPTIONS: 观众席是这么近的吗？ NL 照明灯是这么 #g炽热 的吗？ NL 舞台是这么 #g可怕 的吗？ NL 大家都活在这样的 #g恐惧 里面吗？
但我却没察觉到这些，只看到了小光。

ShoujoKageki:ShineBookEvent.NAME: Script Book
DESCRIPTIONS: #bHikari : Starlight, A story about a distant planet, a long time ago, in the distant future. NL #rKaren : Sacrificing herself for a miracle for her best friend——Flora's courage, NL #bHikari : Losing her memory but not forgetting her promise to her best friend——Karell’s strength, NL #rKaren ：Great! NL #bHikari : Mm, great! NL #rKaren ：This is my baby, my baby book.
I can’t understand it by myself, Hikari.
The new Starlight must be the best stage.

ShoujoKageki:PlayMusicEvent.NAME: Music Player
DESCRIPTIONS: You encountered a disc in the tower, and miraculously, it can play #g~any~ #g~song~ that exists in your mind. NL What do you want to play with it now?
